verses.verse: When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> words, He <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4008>over<s%> the <S%G5493>ravine<s%> of the <S%G2748>Kidron,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> there was a <S%G2779>garden,<s%> into <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G1525>entered,<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> who was <S%G3860>betraying<s%> Him, <S%G3609>knew<s%> the <S%G5117>place;<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G4863>met<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

<S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> the [Roman] <S%G4686>cohort,<s%> and <S%G5257>officers<s%> from the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> with <S%G5322>lanterns<s%> and <S%G2985>torches<s%> and <S%G3696>weapons.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3956>things<s%> that were <S%G2064>coming<s%> upon Him, <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Whom<s%> do you <S%G2212>seek<s%>?"

They <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> the <S%G3480>Nazarene.<s%>" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He.]" And <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> who was <S%G3860>betraying<s%> Him, was <S%G2476>standing<s%> with them.
<S%G5613>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He]," they <S%G565>drew<s%> <S%G3694>back,<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> to the <S%G5476>ground.<s%>
<S%G3825>Again<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> He <S%G1905>asked<s%> them, <S%G5101>"Whom<s%> do you <S%G2212>seek<s%>?" And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> the <S%G3480>Nazarene.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "I <S%G3004>told<s%> you that I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He]; <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you <S%G2212>seek<s%> Me, <S%G863>let<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> their <S%G5217>way,<s%>"

that the <S%G3056>word<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G3004>spoke,<s%> "Of those <S%G3739>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me I <S%G622>lost<s%> not <S%G3762>one.<s%>"

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G3162>sword,<s%> <S%G1670>drew<s%> it, and <S%G3817>struck<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> priest's <S%G1401>slave,<s%> and <S%G609>cut<s%> <S%G609>off<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5621>ear;<s%> and the slave's <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G3124>Malchus.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G906>"Put<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> into the <S%G2336>sheath;<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> Me, shall I not <S%G4095>drink<s%> it?"

<S%G3767>So<s%> the [Roman] <S%G4686>cohort<s%> and the <S%G5506>commander,<s%> and the <S%G5257>officers<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G4815>arrested<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> Him,
and <S%G71>led<s%> Him to <S%G452>Annas<s%> <S%G4413>first;<s%> for he was father-in-law of <S%G2533>Caiaphas,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> that <S%G1763>year.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%> was the one who had <S%G4823>advised<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that it was <S%G4851>expedient<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G190>following<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and [so was] <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3101>disciple.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> that <S%G3101>disciple<s%> was <S%G1110>known<s%> to the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> and <S%G4897>entered<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> into the <S%G833>court<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%>

but <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G2476>standing<s%> at the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G1854>outside.<s%> <S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> who was <S%G1110>known<s%> to the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G3004>spoke<s%> to the <S%G2377>doorkeeper,<s%> and <S%G1521>brought<s%> in <S%G4074>Peter.<s%>

The slave-girl <S%G3767>therefore<s%> who <S%G2377>kept<s%> the <S%G2377>door<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> "You are not <S%G2532>also<s%> [one] of <S%G3778>this<s%> man's <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> are you?" He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> not."

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1401>slaves<s%> and the <S%G5257>officers<s%> were <S%G2476>standing<s%> [there,] having <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G439>charcoal<s%> <S%G439>fire,<s%> for it was <S%G5592>cold<s%> and they were <S%G2328>warming<s%> themselves; and <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was with them, <S%G2476>standing<s%> and <S%G2328>warming<s%> himself.

The <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2065>questioned<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G4012>about<s%> His <S%G1322>teaching.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, "I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G3954>openly<s%> to the <S%G2889>world;<s%> I <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> in <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together;<s%> and I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> in <S%G2927>secret.<s%>

<S%G5101>"Why<s%> do you <S%G2065>question<s%> Me? <S%G2065>Question<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them; <S%G2396>behold,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>said.<s%>"

And when He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G3936>standing<s%> by <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> a <S%G4475>blow,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is that the <S%G3779>way<s%> You <S%G611>answer<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G2560>wrongly,<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of the <S%G2556>wrong;<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2573>rightly,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G1194>strike<s%> Me?"
<S%G452>Annas<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> Him <S%G1210>bound<s%> to <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G2476>standing<s%> and <S%G2328>warming<s%> himself. They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to him, "You are not <S%G2532>also<s%> [one] of His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> are you?" He <S%G720>denied<s%> [it], and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> not."

<S%G1520>One<s%> of the <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> a <S%G4773>relative<s%> of the one <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5621>ear<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G609>cut<s%> <S%G609>off,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Did I not <S%G3708>see<s%> you in the <S%G2779>garden<s%> with Him?"
<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G720>denied<s%> [it] <S%G3825>again;<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> a <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crowed.<s%>

They <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> from <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%> into the <S%G4232>Praetorium,<s%> and it was <S%G4404>early;<s%> and they <S%G846>themselves<s%> did not <S%G1525>enter<s%> into the <S%G4232>Praetorium<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might not be <S%G3392>defiled,<s%> but might <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out to them, and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G2724>accusation<s%> do you <S%G5342>bring<s%> against <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>Man<s%>?"
They <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>Man<s%> were not an <S%G2556>evildoer,<s%> we would not have <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him up to you."

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2983>"Take<s%> Him <S%G4771>yourselves,<s%> and <S%G2919>judge<s%> Him <S%G2596>according<s%> to your <S%G3551>law.<s%>" The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "We are not <S%G1832>permitted<s%> to <S%G615>put<s%> <S%G3762>anyone<s%> to <S%G615>death,<s%>"

that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G3004>spoke,<s%> <S%G4591>signifying<s%> by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G4169>kind<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> He was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G599>die.<s%>

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> into the <S%G4232>Praetorium,<s%> and <S%G5455>summoned<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Are You the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "Are you <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> on your <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1438>initiative,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> did <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> you <S%G4012>about<s%> Me?"

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> not a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> am I? Your own <S%G1484>nation<s%> and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> You up to me; <S%G5101>what<s%> have You <S%G4160>done<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "My <S%G932>kingdom<s%> is not of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> My <S%G932>kingdom<s%> were of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> then My <S%G5257>servants<s%> would be <S%G75>fighting,<s%> that I might not be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up to the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> but as it is, My <S%G932>kingdom<s%> is not of <S%G1782>this<s%> <S%G1782>realm.<s%>"

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3766>"So<s%> You are a <S%G935>king<s%>?" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "You <S%G3004>say<s%> [correctly] that I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G935>king.<s%> For <S%G3778>this<s%> I have been <S%G1080>born,<s%> and for <S%G3778>this<s%> I have <S%G2064>come<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> to <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> to the <S%G225>truth.<s%> <S%G3956>Everyone<s%> who is of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> My <S%G5456>voice.<s%>"

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> is <S%G225>truth<s%>?" And when he had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G156>guilt<s%> in Him.

"But you have a <S%G4914>custom,<s%> that I should <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G1520>someone<s%> for you at the <S%G3957>Passover;<s%> do you <S%G1014>wish<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that I <S%G630>release<s%> for you the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they <S%G2905>cried<s%> out <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Not <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>Man,<s%> but <S%G912>Barabbas.<s%>" <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> was a <S%G3027>robber.<s%>
